column3: Types that contain an empty ArraySegment<>s cannot be checked with IsEquivalentTo.
Revisit AssertionScope and how it travels over chained calls
Move DataSet/DataTable/DataRow assertions to separate library
Suggestion: move fluent DateTime extensions to separate package
Feature: Extend httpResponseMessage.Should().HaveStatusCode() to dump request body on failure
Consider converting NotBeNull() return type to non-nullable assertions
Add an option to BeEquivalentTo that compares types of objects recursively.
